name: BBTAN2 by 222%
description:
BB-BOY needs your help! Come be a hero!


SWIPE and SHOOT balls in perfect angle!
Get on the adventure using skill balls and boosters.


Cool Features
● Enjoy fun graphics & sound!
● Many many special stages (495 stages)
● Hidden stages?!
● Hero’s killer move! Use skills.
● Daily gifts for your journey!


Services
● Compete with your friends
● Save your play on cloud
